messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 152
messages.msgSnippet: I think Joyce is right on. Leave the discussion over there. Kathy, I guess everyone has clarified, I just wanted to explain for myself though.... I think doing
messages.messageBody:
I think Joyce is right on. Leave the discussion over there.
Kathy,
I guess everyone has clarified, I just wanted to explain for myself though....
I think doing what's best for your family is a great idea!
I was balking at people coming for advice in the unschooling context, that
were doing things/having ideas directly in conflict with unschooling and
being told to"just do whatever works for you"
If Sandra, Joyce, Mary and others had done that to me, I would still be
limiting certain things in my childrens lives that I have now let go of. This
has led to greater joy and growth in our home and I would just hope that
anyone seeking information would be given good information. Not just a
friendly pat on the back, YK?
Sorry it wasn't clear.

Dianna, glad another Mum has lousy handwriting...it seems everyone I know has
some form of pretty writing. I'm bad at calligraphy too!! haha
My dh is good at it. I do the artwork, he does the calligraphy when I have a
project that requires it.

And it's good to hear from a Dad. Welcome Nanci K.'s dh!!

Ren
